game.name: My Little Pony Winter Fashion 3
game.description:
We have again brought to you something interesting and challenging that you can cherish for long without any hindrances. This is the time of cold winter and the two little and beautiful ponies named Applejack and Twilight Sparkle are ready to enjoy it in their own style. The first thing they need now is to select the fashionable and warm clothes. Do you think that your ultimate fighting abilities can sort out this puzzle? Join My Little Pony Winter Fashion 3 and be prepared to show off your fashion shades to the world!

First, choose the pony you want to enjoy with and then get ready to dress her up with outfits you like in this brand new dressing game for girls. These ponies love to wear new warm outfits and they trust on your skills very much. So, try to do your best to give them the cutest style possible after challenging your fashion skills. It will be your responsibilities now to choose all the necessary components for them and make them look fabulous. 

Each category, including outfits, shoes, shoes and other things will have multiple patterns and colors to choose from. You will see your chosen pony on the left side of the screen and things will be shown on the right side of the screen. When you complete the look of Applejack, your next job is to find out the perfect clothes for Twilight Sparkle. You will find out five item categories to explore in this html5 princess dress up game. All the best to have a blast in our all online games that are playable for free, no download required!
